name: PIXUM
description:
SPACEBAR or UP arrow or w or CLICK or TAP to jump!

Simple jump based infinite scroller.

Path finding and instincts are tested!

Squares are bad. They make you fat and you lose 0.5 points.

Rectangles are good for you. They give 15 points.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wFPVecso8_g
